tool_description: Get a set of questons with multiple choice answers from several categories
name: Trivia Questions
title: Trivia Questions

api_list.name: Science Trivia Questions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trivia-questions1.p.rapidapi.com/api/trivia/science"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trivia-questions1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
